document.title: Netview: Application Software for Constructing and Visually Exploring Phylogenetic Networks
document.abstract: Reconstructing evolutionary history of a group of species is a major task in biological study. Many methods exist for reconstructing such history, or phylogeny, but most of them are based on an assumption that evolution of given gene family can be represented as a tree.
